Player History
Drafted in 26th round, 416th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 2015...
Injured on 3/25/2016 with a Strained Bicep Tendon, out for 2-3 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/16/2017...
Traded from Cincinnati to New York on 5/6/2018 (Going to CIN: RF Oliver Depaul. Going to NY: P Oscar Santiago, P Roberto Ortiz, P Jame Meany, 2B Bill Scott)...
Had first career hit (double) on 9/10/2019, off Samuel Dupre (BRO)...
Won Gold Glove at Pitcher in 2019...
1/31/2020: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/24/2020, winning 2 games with a 1.42 ERA...
